newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU molassses import duties remain suspended.
newsitem.headline: EU molassses import duties remain suspended.

text.p: European Union duties on imports of molasses will remain suspended for another week, an EU member state official said on Thursday.
The cif reference price for cane molasses was set at 8.32 Ecus per 100 kg, against 8.47 Ecus the previous week.
The reference price for beet molasses was fixed at 12.17 Ecus per 100 kg, against 12.35 Ecus last week.
